mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey (surveyno, topic, startdate, enddate, poster, postersaved, posterthumb, postersize, cnt, continueyn) VALUES (survey_seq.NEXTVAL, #{topic}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{poster}, #{postersaved}, #{posterthumb}, #{postersize}, #{cnt}, #{continueyn})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM survey ORDER BY surveyno DESC
SELECT * FROM survey WHERE topic LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY surveyno DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY surveyno DESC) AS rownum, survey.* FROM survey) WHERE rownum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
